trans-unit.source: Contains helper functions to convert property values to and from strings.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于与字符串转换属性值的帮助器函数。

trans-unit.source: The PropertyConverter class is used by the ASP.NET page framework and is not intended to be accessed directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: PropertyConverter 类可由 ASP.NET 页面框架并不能在代码中直接访问。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Enum> structure to convert string values to and from enumerators, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> to convert objects.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Enum>结构将字符串值转换到和从枚举器，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>将对象转换。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> </xref:System.Enum>

trans-unit.source: Converts the string representation to a value of the specified enumeration type.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串表示形式转换为指定的枚举类型的值。

trans-unit.source: The EnumFromString method is used to convert a string value to its equivalent enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: EnumFromString 方法用于将字符串值转换为其等效的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此成员支持.NET Framework 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: To convert a string value to its equivalent enumeration value, use the <xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将一个字符串值转换为其等效的枚举值，使用<xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Enum.Parse%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the enumeration type to create from the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> ，它表示要从创建的枚举类型`value`参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> that represents a value in the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>前者表示的枚举器中的值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration of type enumType.
trans-unit.target: 类型的枚举 enumType 。

trans-unit.source: enumType or value is .
trans-unit.target: enumTypeor value is .

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of the specified enumeration type to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的枚举类型的值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: The EnumToString method is used to convert an enumeration value to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: EnumToString 方法用于将一个枚举值转换为其等效的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此成员支持.NET Framework 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: To convert an enumeration value to its equivalent string representation, use the <xref:System.Enum.Format%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将一个枚举值转换为其等效字符串表示形式，使用<xref:System.Enum.Format%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Enum.Format%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the enumeration type of `enumValue`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName>表示枚举类型的`enumValue`。

trans-unit.source: The value to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的值。

trans-unit.source: The string representation of enumValue.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式 enumValue 。

trans-unit.source: The enumType or enumValue parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The enumType or enumValue parameter is .

trans-unit.source: Converts the string value to the specified object type.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串值转换为指定的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The ObjectFromString method is used to convert a string value to an object.
trans-unit.target: ObjectFromString 方法用于将字符串值转换为对象。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 此成员支持.NET Framework 基础结构，不宜在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: To convert a string value to an object, use the `Parse` method for that object if the object provides a `Parse` method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将一个字符串值转换为一个对象，使用`Parse`方法为该对象，如果该对象提供`Parse`方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, an <xref:System.Int32> object can be created from a string through the <xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Int32>可以从通过字符串创建对象<xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A>方法。</xref:System.Int32.Parse%2A> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName> to create from `value`.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.Type?displayProperty=fullName>从创建`value`。

trans-unit.source: The properties to use during conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要在转换期间使用的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to convert into an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>将转换为对象。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An object of type objType.
trans-unit.target: 类型的对象 objType 。

trans-unit.source: An object of the type specified by objType cannot be created from the value parameter.
trans-unit.target: 由指定的类型的对象 objType 无法从创建 value 参数。
